column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Lou Malnati's Pizzeria was okay. Just okay. It was insanely busy - we had to wait 2 hours. The food was mediocre. Our group of 4 was seated at a tiny table. Our appetizer plates were never removed off of our table
column3: we literally had no where to eat. The staff seemed nice
column5: the whole restaurant was over hyped and disappointed us in general.
